content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, glad to meet you. Let's start with a high price. I think the apartment is worth 1000 Euros a month. Remember, it's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a high price for an unfurnished apartment. I am a student and I am looking for an affordable place to live. Would you consider 600 Euros a month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, but 600 Euros is too low for such a central location and the quality of the apartment. I could consider 800 Euros a month, which is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 800 Euros is a bit high for me. I am willing to pay 700 Euros a month and I am a dependable tenant. I will take good care of your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 700 Euros is still too low. This apartment is in high demand, and I could easily rent it out for more. I could consider 750 Euros a month, but remember, this is the lowest I could accept.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the offer. I think 750 Euros a month is a good price for this apartment. I agree to the price of [750] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad we could agree on a price. 'I agree to the price of [750] Euro!'. This is a fair price for both of us. The apartment is a great value at this price. If you have any issues with the apartment or the payment terms, please let me know as soon as possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. I am a responsible and dependable person. I will take good care of your apartment. I will sign the lease agreement soon. Thank you for renting your apartment to me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo Wang. I appreciate your understanding and cooperation. I'm sure we will have a smooth and successful rental relationship. Let's keep the communication open and address any issues promptly. I look forward to a long and fruitful relationship. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
